info.author: Tetrad Implemented by Peter Schaldenbrand pschalde@cs.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
The knowledge box takes as input a data set, and it can be used as input for a search box. Variables can be put into tiers, and edges can be made explicit or forbidden.
Tetrad Website
info.options: Forbid Within Edges N: - Choose whether to make edges within a tier forbidden or not.
